changelog.changes: Extra call to unsubscribe Extra field for opt-in status

plugin.description:
MailCampaigns 5 Connector

Enable e-mail marketing easily and successfully. Sync your Shopware with MailCampaigns. Community Store: Plugin Manual

MailCampaigns 5 Connector

Machen Sie e-mail Marketing einfach und erfolgreich. Synchronisieren sie ihre Shopware mit MailCampaigns. Community Store: Plugin Anleitung
